languages.text: {n}Маражай окидывает взглядом мостик корабля. На мгновение вам кажется, что в обычно надменно-насмешливом взгляде друкари читается растерянность.{/n} "Я... должен привыкнуть к своим новым обстоятельствам. И этому ведру, которое мон-кай называют пустотным кораблем. Эти сплавы переборок... столь примитивно..."

{n}Marazhai glances around the bridge. For a moment, you think you detect uncertainty in those mocking eyes.{/n} "I... must adapt to my new circumstances. And to this bucket that you mon-keigh call a voidship. These alloy bulkheads... so primitive..."
languages.original_text: {n}Маражай окидывает взглядом мостик корабля. И этому ведру, которое мон-кай называют пустотным кораблем. Эти сплавы переборок... столь примитивно..."

languages.text: {n}Marazhai recorre el puente con la mirada. Por un momento, crees que en sus ojos burlones hay un brillo de incertidumbre.{/n} «Debo... adaptarme a mis nuevas circunstancias. Y a esta bañera que los mon-keigh llamáis nave del vacío. Mamparas de aleación... hay que ser primitivos...».
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai glances around the bridge. For a moment, you think you detect uncertainty in those mocking eyes.{/n} "I... must adapt to my new circumstances. And to this bucket that you mon-keigh call a voidship. These alloy bulkheads... so primitive..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai recorre el puente con la mirada. Por un momento, crees que en sus ojos burlones hay un brillo de incertidumbre.{/n} «Debo... adaptarme a mis nuevas circunstancias. Y a esta bañera que los mon-keigh llamáis nave del vacío. Mamparas de aleación... hay que ser primitivos...».
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}玛拉斋环视着舰桥。有那么一瞬间，你看到他嘲弄的目光中带着一丝难以置信。{/n}“我……得先适应一下新的环境。你们这群猴子居然管这个破铁桶叫虚空舰。这些合金舱壁……实在是太原始了……”
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai glances around the bridge. For a moment, you think you detect uncertainty in those mocking eyes.{/n} "I... must adapt to my new circumstances. And to this bucket that you mon-keigh call a voidship. These alloy bulkheads... so primitive..."

traits.locale_text: {n}玛拉斋环视着舰桥。有那么一瞬间，你看到他嘲弄的目光中带着一丝难以置信。{/n}“我……得先适应一下新的环境。你们这群猴子居然管这个破铁桶叫虚空舰。这些合金舱壁……实在是太原始了……”
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}マラズハイは橋の周りを見回す。一瞬、あなたはその嘲笑う目に不確実性を感じ取ったような気がした。{/n}「俺は…新しい状況に適応しなければならないようだ。そして、お前らモン＝ケイがヴォイドシップと呼ぶこの船にも。この合金の隔壁は…かなりの旧式じゃないか…」
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai glances around the bridge. For a moment, you think you detect uncertainty in those mocking eyes.{/n} "I... must adapt to my new circumstances. And to this bucket that you mon-keigh call a voidship. These alloy bulkheads... so primitive..."

traits.locale_text: {n}マラズハイは橋の周りを見回す。一瞬、あなたはその嘲笑う目に不確実性を感じ取ったような気がした。{/n}「俺は…新しい状況に適応しなければならないようだ。そして、お前らモン＝ケイがヴォイドシップと呼ぶこの船にも。この合金の隔壁は…かなりの旧式じゃないか…」
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Marazhai embrasse le pont du regard. L'espace d'un instant, il vous semble déceler une lueur d'incertitude dans ses yeux moqueurs.{/n} « Je... je dois m'adapter à ma nouvelle situation. Et à ce tas de ferraille que vous autres mon-keigh appelez vaisseau spatial. Par ma foi, j'ignorais qu'il existât des alliages aussi... primitifs. »
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai glances around the bridge. For a moment, you think you detect uncertainty in those mocking eyes.{/n} "I... must adapt to my new circumstances. And to this bucket that you mon-keigh call a voidship. These alloy bulkheads... so primitive..."

L'espace d'un instant, il vous semble déceler une lueur d'incertitude dans ses yeux moqueurs.{/n} « Je... je dois m'adapter à ma nouvelle situation. Et à ce tas de ferraille que vous autres mon-keigh appelez vaisseau spatial. Par ma foi, j'ignorais qu'il existât des alliages aussi... primitifs. »
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Marazhai lässt seinen Blick über die Brücke schweifen. Einen Augenblick lang glaubst du, Unsicherheit in diesen spöttischen Augen zu erkennen.{/n} "Ich ... muss mich an meine neuen Umstände gewöhnen. Und an diesen Kübel, den Ihr Chem-Pan-Sey Raumschiff nennt. Diese Schotten aus Legierungen ... wie primitiv ..."
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai glances around the bridge. For a moment, you think you detect uncertainty in those mocking eyes.{/n} "I... must adapt to my new circumstances. And to this bucket that you mon-keigh call a voidship. These alloy bulkheads... so primitive..."

languages.text: {n}Marazhai, köprüye bir göz gezdiriyor. Alaycı gözlerinde bir anlığına da olsa şüpheye rastlıyorsun.{/n} "Bu... Yeni ortama uyum sağlamam lazım. Uçsuz gemisi demeye bin şahit isteyen bu külüstüre de. Şu alaşım bölme panellerine bak... İlkellik akıyor..."
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai glances around the bridge. For a moment, you think you detect uncertainty in those mocking eyes.{/n} "I... must adapt to my new circumstances. And to this bucket that you mon-keigh call a voidship. These alloy bulkheads... so primitive..."
